Title: MagicWatering
Description: the MagicWatering system is used to control the irrigation devices based on the weather forecast or manually&remotely per created watering programs.

Project Description
the MagicWatering system is used to control the irrigation devices based on the weather forecast or manually&remotely per created watering programs.
